name: concerto
description: You must install [Lerna](https://lernajs.io) to build this multi-package repository.

scripts.coverage: istanbul-combine -d coverage -r lcov packages/concerto-cli/coverage/*.json packages/concerto-core/coverage/*.json  packages/concerto-tools/coverage/*.json && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.postinstall: npm run pkgcheck && npm run bootstrap
scripts.pretest: npm run doc && npm run licchk
